title: Science Curriculum Design Utilizing Creative Multimodal Metaphors

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced understanding of scientific disciplines and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Learners are ordinary citizens with rich experience in science, capable of utilizing various digital tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can creatively transform and explain complex scientific concepts using multimodal metaphors (verbal and physical expressions)
Learners can develop concrete strategies for innovating instructional design in science education through metaphorical thinking
Learners can design science education materials using metaphors through project-based assessment and incorporate peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
